name: Outliner
description:
Uses a Game Pad to work!

The D Pad is for moving while jumping can be through pressing "X" on the controller.

The text that's in each level gets removed the moment you press any key on the right side of the controller.

-----------------------

Outliner is a short platformer about a character who follows his soulmate through the dangers of life. He's blinded by love, there's no feat he can't overcome. She's all the strength he needs.

Movement allows the player to view the entire world's outline. When there's no movement, the player's view is limited.
